title: 'Works as expected'

title: '10 year warranty mentioned is a sham.'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. I purchased it in August 2022 and it become blunt within six months.  Reply by 3m on 31.3.2023 is as below:-  Hello Ravi
column5: Thanks for using 3M product and sharing your valuable feedback with us.  We have reviewed your product complaint details and on investigation we found that this product has been sold without manufacturing inconsistencies. We will therefore not be able to replace the product. Thank you for reaching out to us.  Warm Regards
column6: Nelvin Customer Contact Center.  Company has never replied to my query regarding 10 years warranty.'
